name: Fairytiles
description:
Fairytiles

Fairytiles is the love child of a “Choose your own Adventure” book  and a game of Scrabble  – choose your words wisely! Armed with only a handful of letter tiles, take a bold adventurer  through the journey of her lifetime!

Features
  • Start with nothing, end with… a cat ? Dragons ?
  • Complete with 120 creative chapters and 26 alphabetized achievements.
How to play
  • Scroll to go through the story
  • Type to enter words
  • BACKSPACE to correct
  • ENTER to commit
  • ESCAPE or DELETE to undo
  • SPACE to shuffle (hold space for clearer hints).
  • ? for help
